content: spaces popcorn = popcorn use your project s popcorn definition if you haven t defined it elsewhere the standard is 5 double_crochet popcorn c make & attach make 4 flowers total then sew 1 flower onto each corner centered over the spring green corner area weave in ends neatly round 92 fondant a start in any stitch work 1 half_double_crochet blo in each stitch around b on each puff from round 90 work ch3 replace the half_double_crochet on that puff c continue around keeping half_double_crochet blo on all the other stitches d join with 1 slip_stitch in the first half_double_crochet or first stitch made total 788 half_double_crochet blo 197 per side 4 chain-3 spaces 1 per corner round 93 fondant a start in any corner round 90 puff3 ch1 puff3 b continue around round 92 working 1 fphdc in each stitch of the previous round c repeat round 93a in the remaining 3 corner chain-1 spaces d join with 1 slip_stitch in the top of the first puff total 788 fphdc 197 per side 8 puff3 2 per corner 4 chain-1 spaces between puff3 1 per corner round 94 jade a start in any corner chain-1 space puff3 chain 1 puff3 b along the side work in blo r92 *skip 1 st puff3 in next st chain 1* repeat to the next corner c repeat for all 4 sides working the corner puff3 chain 1 puff3 each time join with 1 slip_stitch in the closing chain of the 1st puff total 400 puff3 98 per side 2 per corner 396 chain-1 space 98 per side 1 per corner continue images r 94 round 95 fondant a side 1 double_crochet in first hdcblo r92 1fpsc in the puff r95 continue the finish the side with 1 double_crochet b corner ch8* c repeat in another side d join with 1 slip_stitch in the first double_crochet total 388 double_crochet 97 per side 392 fpsc 98 per side 4 chain-8 space 1 per corner round 96 fondant a start in any corner between the 2 corner puffs b corner fpsc in 1st corner puff r94 chain 3 fpsc in next corner puff c side fpsc in each st around repeat for all 4 corners and sides join with 1 slip_stitch in the 1st fpsc total 788 fpsc 195 per side 2 per corner 4 chain-3 spaces 1 per corner round 97 kelly green a corner in the corner chain-1 space bring the chain-1 loops from r94 to the front work 2 treble_crochet chain 1 or ch2 depending your gauge 2 treble_crochet b move to the 1st blo st of r95 and work treble_crochet chain 1 c go back to the corner chain-3 space of r96 and work 1 treble_crochet d side working on r95 in blo *skip 2 sts treble_crochet in next st chain 1 treble_crochet in the 1st skipped st* repeat across the side e at the end of the side repeat the treble_crochet chain 1 and the extra treble_crochet in corner chain-
